EmailTemplate.name: AM application DOB system error
EmailTemplate.subject: Associate Mentor Applications - DOB system error resolved!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Associate Mentor System Error: resolved!
Unfortunately there was a problem submitting date of birth on some applications, but that has now been fixed.
Please submit your application as usual here: http://survey.clicktools.com/app/survey/go.jsp?iv=2bbhwytrbxr8v
If you have already submitted your application and your date of birth is incorrect, we will email you with a form to put in your correct birthday.
If you have any questions, then please email graduates@the-challenge.org.
